page.title: 01Land South of Woodsetts
page.content: Our Domesday Block is{rural.}It is Situated on the border of{South {Yorkshire}and{Nottinghamshire.}The village of{Shireoaks}is a quiet{Mining {community}with long terraced houses. {Woodsetts}is the largest part of the villages in our D block.{Lindrick {Common}stretches over most of our D block. There is a school similar to {Woodsetts}junior school in{Shireoaks which has the only{railway station}in our D block .There are few{factories. {Thorpe Salvin}is a small village with no shops, but an old{church.Lindrick {golf course}provides club members with enjoyment.The{A57}cuts across the Common.There is a{canal}called the {Chesterfield canal}and the railway goes next to it.
